00018 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00019 #include <votca/ctp/qmtopology.h>
00020 
00021 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00022 
00023 QMPair::QMPair(QMCrgUnit *crg1, QMCrgUnit *crg2, QMTopology * top)
00024   : std::pair<QMCrgUnit *, QMCrgUnit *>(crg1,crg2), _rate_12(0.),_rate_21(0.), _in_database(false)
00025 {
00026     vec crg1nm,crg2nm;
00027     crg1nm =  crg1->GetCom();
00028     crg2nm =  crg2->GetCom();
00029     _r = top->BCShortestConnection(crg1nm, crg2nm);
00030     _crg2 = second;
00031 
00032     // check if PBC:
00033     vec d = crg2nm - crg1nm;
00034     if (abs(d - _r) > 1e-8) {
00035         _ghost = new QMCrgUnit();
00036         _ghost->copyCrgUnit(*crg2);
00037         vec displ = (_r - d);
00038         _ghost->shift(displ);
00039         _crg2 = _ghost;
00040     }
00041     else {
00042         _ghost=NULL;
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 double QMPair::calcJeff2(){
00047     vector<double>::iterator itj=_Js.begin();
00048     double j=0.;
00049     for (;itj!= _Js.end(); itj++){
00050         j+=(*itj)*(*itj);
00051     }
00052     j/= double(_Js.size());
00053     return j;
00054 }
